themes: Serving a more diverse and urban population
key_phrases: return to pre-Covid, cultural-value driven support criteria
support the art and entertainment needs of a much larger, much more diverse and much more urban population of 2026
knowing say a jazzclub would attract different attention than a communityTheater
barriers_identified: Current criteria may not address the needs of a more diverse and urban population
solutions_proposed: Return to pre-Covid, cultural-value driven support criteria
Use creative sector specific metrics for evaluation
Assess support for workforce development, tourism, and diverse urban populations in funding decisions
